info.name: Software Catalogus
info.summary: Easily manage and publish software catalogs in an open data ecosystem
info.description:
🗂️ A Nextcloud App for Software Catalogs
The Software Catalogus Nextcloud app offers a powerful framework for managing and synchronizing software catalogs within a federated, open data environment.
- 🔄 Synchronize your software data with multiple catalogs - 📡 Automatically publish and update your software catalog information - 🆓 Completely free and open source under the EUPL license
**Note: System Cron is required for this app to function properly**
Find the installation requirements [here](https://conduction.gitbook.io/opencatalogi-nextcloud/install).
View the development roadmap [here](https://github.com/orgs/OpenCatalogi/projects/1/views/2).
Submit a [bug report](https://github.com/OpenCatalogi/.github/issues/new/choose).
Submit a [feature request](https://github.com/OpenCatalogi/.github/issues/new/choose).
